document_name_accent: ung thu vom hong giai doan 3.json
document_title: Stage 3 nasopharyngeal cancer: Symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Nasopharyngeal cancer is staged from stage 0 to stage 4, in which stage 3 nasopharyngeal cancer is considered to be the locally advanced stage, when tumor cells have invaded organs. surrounding organs (such as skull base, cervical spine, nasal sinuses, etc.), multiple lymph node metastases on both sides of the neck without signs of distant metastases. (first)
subsection_title: ung thu vom hong giai doan 3.json. What is stage 3 nasopharyngeal cancer?
subsection_data:
ung thu vom hong giai doan 3.json. What is stage 3 nasopharyngeal cancer?
Nasopharyngeal cancer is staged from stage 0 to stage 4, in which stage 3 nasopharyngeal cancer is considered to be the locally advanced stage, when tumor cells have invaded organs. surrounding organs (such as skull base, cervical spine, nasal sinuses, etc.), multiple lymph node metastases on both sides of the neck without signs of distant metastases. (first)
